website_summaries.verdict: It's not the fastest hair regrowth product on the market, but it's one of the most reliable options out there.
pros: Minoxidil is FDA approved for hair regrowth
cons: Must apply twice daily and it may take a little while to see results

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: After I purchased and received this product there was a warning on the box that said "if your hair loss doesn't look like the hair loss photos on the side of the box, do not use!" Of course my hair loss didn't match the 3 very similar photos they provided. This warning should have been given BEFORE the purchase. And then I found out the product was not returnable. False Advertising!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Tarvins

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for regrowth of hair loss but its a combination of products
customer_reviews.text: I had chemo, lost all my hair, when it came back in I had lost all my natural curl and it was black. Then it started to fall out. My hairstylist recommended the Nioxin line of hair repair products and they are doing wonderful at filling out my hair and lots of new growth, you are suppose to put on 2 times a day but I just do once because it will mess up you hair style unless you wash it the next morning. I use the Nioxin cleanser, conditioner and high density along with this. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: noknots

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It's time another order. I have my mom on this for thinning and a few other's and we love it. I even use it for my edges.
customer_reviews.author: Shalonda

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I lost some hair from the crown due to stress - it has come back with the help of the Nioxin. My daughter, a former cancer patient, told me about it because it worked for her to get her hair back after chemo.
customer_reviews.author: SFB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After using Nioxin for a few months, my hair has gotten thicker and my bald spots have disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Facial hair!
customer_reviews.text: You will grow peach fuzz facial hair.... Don't be shocked!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if anyone else has had issues with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if anyone else has had issues with this item but after 3 uses I developed a severe rash on my scalp. I know that this had to be the cause of it because I have not introduced any NEW items to my hair routine except this. I am currently in the process of trying to return this item as it indicates it is non returnable. Please check before you buy in case you run into any issues that this item can be returned. I will update if they allow me to return the item or not. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Always buying something

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: i have been using minoxidil for over a year. Yes, you must use it twice a day, a bit of a pain. Before using it, my hair was insufficient to totally hide my scalp, now it is thicker than it ever was.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. always in a hurry

customer_reviews.title: CONSULT YOUR DOCTORS BEFORE USING.
customer_reviews.text: I had an adverse reaction to the product after only using 1 day. fingers swelled, legs swelled and my glaucoma eye pressure increased dramatically. I am still seeing my orthomologist to get this corrected. He has prescribed new eye drops to try to get the pressure down. Hopefully it can be corrected.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: This treatment has worked better than anything that I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 7 months and there is a real difference in the thickness of my hair. This treatment has worked better than anything that I have ever tried. My hair is better than it has been for years!
customer_reviews.author: DANA JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: This product is way better then the others
customer_reviews.text: I have waited to write a review. This product is way better then the others. You can see new hair with in a week before you know it you have hair faster then the other products yes highly recommend this product would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Conlon

customer_reviews.title: Wow it actually works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works!! It takes a while but keep at it, it works. I'm growing hair on my widows peak. I've never had hair there before, I just thought I'd try it but now it's really working!
customer_reviews.author: Susi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, be patient it could take a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: D. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This hasn’t kept my hair from falling out at all. I’m on my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Andréa Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Thicker hair
customer_reviews.text: As long as you use this product, it keeps the hair thick. Will cover bare spots. New hair is growing.
customer_reviews.author: PenIrby

customer_reviews.title: Nor returnable
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Bought product read the details onbox realize it will not help with my situation. Attempt to return item and it says item us not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not continuing with this product. It causes my hair to feel brittle and my scalp to itch. I'm disappointed as it was less expensive than Rograine and I appreciated the savings. Instead it was money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Hair loss stops and hair grows right back. 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product does does exactly what it's supposed to. My hair grew right back and it stopped my hair loss completely. I recommend this product 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: No Fallout!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has completely stopped my hair fallout! No more handfuls of hair in the sink or shower!! It says it takes about 8-9 months for growth, which is understandable, so I can’t speak to regrowth yet. I’m just so thrilled I have no hair in the sink or shower!! Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Have noticed hair growing back been using product for over 6 months. i would recommend giving this a try to help hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Jules H

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product every night, until the price almost doubled!!! So I do not use it any longer, not really sure it was helping anyhow!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This should work better, I dont feel it is real effective but better than not using anything
customer_reviews.author: miller16018

customer_reviews.title: Most of these types of products either take a long time to work or don't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: I hate using it, when dry it makes hair feel like straw, it is a nuisance to have to use twice per day. If I knew of something that worked better and faster I would consider it.
customer_reviews.author: skatterbol

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Minoxidil for years, but Nioxin's version is by far the best. When I was using Rogaine, it did improve the thickness of my hair, but I still found fallen strands all over my bathroom floor. This is not happening since I began using Nioxin's Minoxidil product. I hope they never stop selling it!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: not happy with this. it broke me out really bad

customer_reviews.title: My Hair Is Growing Back
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much. I'm getting great results. My hair is growing back.

customer_reviews.text: I used this pack and didn't notice any difference. What a waste.

customer_reviews.title: Minimal Results
customer_reviews.text: After using the product for 5 months, I did see some minimal hair growth in my temple area. However, I don't believe this is a good product for me. because the hair growth is so minimal. Perhaps I let the situation go too long before utilizing this product.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: At first I didnt like quit using tryed some else that was no good. Started using again Nioxin Minodoxil faithfully morn and night and now see tons of new growth. Highly reccomend. You will see new grow in a few weeks .

customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've been using for a month now, and I do see new growth about an inch in length.

customer_reviews.text: I was going bald as a woman not acceptable. i used Bosley for a couple years with no results. I switched to Nioxin and within 3 months I noticed new growth now I’m not so aware of bald spots. This product is only for the top of head and not meant for all over baldness

customer_reviews.text: I have baby fine hair. I have been using this all over my scalp for several years. My stylist and I can see all the new hairs growing in as we run a comb through my hair upwards and let my hair naturally fall. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair even thin even worse.
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using after three weeks as my hair was thinning worse with this product. I used twice a day as directed. Decided to stop using as hair seemed to be thinner and more scalp showing than when before I started using this product. Was very hopeful that this would help. Unfortunately not the case.

If you're a busy person it's a hassle. 2x a day and being a woman my hair needs to be styled all day so I'm limited to time I can use it. It does say a minimum of 4 months to see results but I didn't notice a thing after 6 weeks. I use their shampoo and conditioner every day and love that. Just not this

customer_reviews.title: Hair raising results..
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 2 months and I see a lot of little hairs coming in. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Patience Prudence!
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful, but this product really works if you are patient. I lost hair after an illness that required surgery. My hairline was especially noticeable in front as bald and recessing on the upper sides of my scalp. My dermatologist recommended a minoxidil product and warned me that it would take several months to see results. I followed the instructions faithfully and within four months hair began to return. Again, it is important to be patient -- Good things come to those who wait!
customer_reviews.author: Kaggy

customer_reviews.title: My hairdresser recommended I try Nioxin
customer_reviews.text: I am 62 years old and have had thin hair all my life. The last few years I have been losing even more hair. My hairdresser recommended I try Nioxin. Although it is pricey and needs to be applied twice a day, I was willing to give it a try. After about 4 months I started to notice a difference. I can honestly say there is new growth and my hair is a bit fuller. Looks like I will continue using this product for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Schneekloth

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT ON THE MARKET!
customer_reviews.text: IT REALLY MAKES A DIFFERENCE!!! MY SISTER, WHO I HAD NOT SEEN IN A YEAR AND A HALF, ASKED IF I HAD A FACELIFT!!! FUNNY HOW IMPORTANT HAIR IS!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Hair is growing! As promised! After 2 months!!

It might not work for every situation but for most it will! Wife is pleased with product thus far! 4.5 stars i truly give it! 5 stars if it was faster!!

customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a week so don't have results yet, but it is very gentle on the scalp compared to Rogaine. No itching or burning. Price on this product has nearly doubled in the last 6 months. Will be purchasing Rogaine again.

customer_reviews.text: Good product. I've tried similar products by other brands and they don't work as well. Visable difference within weeks. I would order again. Nioxin always worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Since starting to use this product about 6 months ago, my hair is much thicker and fuller on the top of my head than it was before. I am 60 years old and felt that I really didn’t want to have a bald patch on the top of my head! Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: pja

customer_reviews.title: I've found the product really works for me!
customer_reviews.text: So fair I've found it the most effective hair growth product I've tried. As a 2x survival of ovarian cancer I've had a great deal of chemotherapy that has caused me to never recover the very thick hair I used to have. I've tried a number of products and this one works best; after only a few weeks my hair is getting thicker. Supposedly the minoxidil only works if you have hereditary hair loss and since my father and three sons are bald I guess I qualify for that reason too!

product_meta.title: Nioxin Minoxidil Hair Regrowth Treatment For Women, 3 Count
product_meta.description:
Discover NIOXIN Hair Regrowth Treatment for Women, designed to regrow hair with 2% Minoxidil. This hair regrowth treatment for women is suitable to treat multiple hair types, including curly hair and those who have curly hair loss. 2% Minoxidil is the only ingredient clinically proven to effectively help hair regrowth in women and is the only medicine available to treat female pattern baldness. When first beginning the NIOXIN Hair Regrowth Treatment, hair loss may continue for up to two weeks. This hair loss is temporary, but if it continues for more than two weeks, clients should consult their doctor. 

 * Minoxidil is the only ingredient clinically proven to effectively help hair growth 
 * A colorless liquid medication proven to help regrow hair
 * Designed to be used only on the top of the scalp
 * Designed specifically for advanced thinning hair
 * Award: Behind the Chair Stylist Choice Winner Favorite Thinning Haircare, 16 consecutive years
 *  For all hair types
 * Enroll in Subscribe and Save to ensure you never run out!



ABOUT NIOXIN
NIOXIN is the only salon brand with 25+ years of experience in THINNING HAIR. NIOXIN, supported by The Institute of Trichologists, believes SCALP HEALTH is an extension of facial skin and requires the same attention and care.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
